Title: Relates to designating September 11th Remembrance Day as a public holiday
Summary: Designates September 11th Remembrance day as a public holiday.
LawCode: Amd §24, Gen Con L; amd §§14-f & 140, Transp L; amd §376-a, V & T L; amd §§426 & 441, Pers Prop L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general construction law, the transportation law, the vehicle and traffic law and the personal property law, in relation to designating September 11th Remembrance Day as a public holiday
